name: A Dresden Look-Alike City Liminal Lockdown Driving Simulator
name_original: A Dresden Look-Alike City Liminal Lockdown Driving Simulator
description:
This is A Dresden Look-Alike City Liminal Lockdown Driving Simulator. It is nothing but a relaxation or a stress relief game. You can drive around this city alone. There is no traffic, no interactions, no goals, no time limits, no easter eggs ect. Just a big enough city model to get lost and a car. Its driving simulation is not even advanced.  I did not add engine sounds for tranquility reasons. So if you want to donate, please be sure.

Rar document includes:

-Game

-Maps

-Soundtrack

-Screenshots

For Donations: I have modeled everything and made almost every textures by myself. No assets used from internet. I have made soundtracks too.  I want to make more games, art and comics. I have modeled and sketched almost every aspect of the other games and wrote scenarios for them.  

Thanks for your interest, 

DIY-ART
